original_text: All thy rulers are fled together, they are bound by the archers: all that are found in thee are bound together, which have fled from far.
korean_text: 너의 관원들도 다 함께 도망하였다가 활을 버리고 결박을 당하였고 너의 멀리 도망한 자들도 발견되어 다 함께 결박을 당하였도다

sentences.original_text: All thy rulers are fled together,
they are bound by the archers:
all that are found in thee are bound together,
sentences.korean_translation: 너 안에서 발견된 모든 자들이 함께 얽매였고,
